description: This file defines the 'Event' class within the domain models of an event planning system. It contains properties related to event scheduling, capacity, and identification, along with a method to check for time overlaps between events.

classes.name: Event
classes.description: Represents an event with scheduling, capacity, and identification details. Provides functionality to determine if it overlaps with another event.

methods.name: IsOverlapping
methods.description: Checks whether the current event overlaps in time with another event.
